title: Playwright-webextext E2E Testing Migration
details:
Implemented Playwright testing migration from broken Xvfb+Chrome setup to playwright-webextext for Firefox extension testing.

## Key Changes:
1. Created new `playwright.config.js` using playwright-webextext for TRUE headless Firefox testing (no Xvfb needed)
2. Created test infrastructure in `tests/e2e/`:
   - `fixtures/extension.js` - Custom fixture with `withExtension()` from playwright-webextext
   - `helpers/quick-tabs.js` - Helper utilities for Quick Tabs testing
   - `scenarios/` directory for test scenario files
3. Added new npm scripts: test:e2e, test:e2e:ui, test:e2e:headed, test:e2e:debug, test:all
4. Created `.github/workflows/e2e-extension-tests.yml` - new workflow with proper permissions
5. Archived old workflow as `.yml.OLD` with deprecation notice

## Key Technical Details:
- `playwright-webextext` package is already in devDependencies (v0.0.4)
- Firefox extensions work in TRUE headless mode without Xvfb
- Use `withExtension(firefox, extPath)` to load extension
- Install Firefox: `npx playwright install firefox --with-deps`
- Test Bridge API is optional - tests work without TEST_MODE=true
